TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed GeneralTransform3DGroup extends System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D

Docs.summary: Represents a that is a composite of the transforms in its .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this class when you want to apply multiple general transforms to single object.
GeneralTransform3DGroup is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object). For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
Clone is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup CloneCurrentValue() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this object, making deep copies of this object's current values. Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object). For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
CloneCurrentValue is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.summary: Gets the inverse transform of this , if it has an inverse.
Docs.value: The inverse transform of this , if it has an inverse; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The inverse of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup> is created by combining the inverses of its child transforms.
Inverse is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D TransformBounds(valuetype System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D rect) cil managed

Docs.summary: Transforms the specified 3-D bounding box to the smallest axis-aligned 3-D bounding box possible that contains all the points in the original bounding box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks TransformBounds is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
